name: Kemps
description:
**Play with up to 8 friends with one purchase! With Kemps Friend's Pass, friends can join your private games for free!**

Kemps is a fast-paced online card game that brings together 4 to 8 players, divided into teams of 2, where players score points by secretly communicating to their partner when they have collected 4 of a kind. This exhilarating game thrives on clever tactics such as strategic signaling, decoy signaling, card counting, and even subtle body language, all aimed at gaining a competitive edge over your opponents. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled experience where teamwork, deception, and keen observation to pave the way to victory!

CHOOSE A SIGNAL
Signals serve two purposes: communication and bonus points. Signals are primarily used between partners to communicate when either player has obtained four of a kind. Additionally, the more dramatic the signal, the more bonus points a team can score by using their signal! Beware that a more obvious signal makes it easier for your opponents to utilize your own cards against you.

STRATEGIZE AGAINST YOUR FOES
Bait the opposition with your decoy signal. Card count to steal a winning hand from your opponent. Double blink or wiggle your eyebrows to communicate in a secret code. Use every tool to your advantage!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER
Choose from a variety of medieval gear from which to author your own personal avatar.

KEY FEATURES:
- Support for lobbies of 4 to 8 players with the option to substitute bot players where needed.
- A library of signals to choose from sorted by their subtlety to balance risk vs reward.
- Card counting and bluffing mechanics to score off of your opponents.
- Customizable avatars (with optional hats!).
